page.title: 04Mr Twigg.
page.content:
They have taken the tollgate house down. 7. When you are working at the school what do you like doing best? I like to come in school and to hear the children singing .Thats one of the best things.
8. What is the funniest thing that happened to you at the school? I don't think I have had any thing funny only one little girl asked me how old I was and I said I was 5 and she said " Have you been 100, Mr Twigg?" 9. Have you got any favourite places? Yes, Willoughbridge gardens. It's a beautiful place. That is my favarate place.
